name: Latent Timespace No.3: See the Rise of Cloud
description:
Imagination has always been one of the most important gifts that human have been given. It is extremely vital and does not rely on any technology to exist, when only few words, like poem, could easily resonated the audiences. The idea of this work is taken from the poem of the Chinese ancient poet Wang Wei, “To the end of water, see the rise of cloud". With the help of AI technology, we could take you through a thousand years of time and space to share a latent space with the poet.

Introduction of the series: Latent Timespace, is the invisible higher dimensional space-time. The three-dimensional universe we currently see may only be a drop in the universe ocean. This series aims to reveal the knowable or unknowable sceneries in parallel universe with the help of artificial intelligence (AI), expanding the boundaries of vision that were normally limited in three dimensions.
